resources.string:
These are the permissions we require for you to fully enjoy this app. Without these permissions the app sadly has very little utility. 
Location for tracking
 
Activity recognition is for the step counter.
 
Camera recognitions is required for pictures and AR
 We only use notification to keep you updated that you are tracking.
Are you sure you want to delete this POI

As a digital nomad, you know that the key to traveling the world is being able to stay connected. And with your busy lifestyle, you don't have time to research long lists of travel apps. That's why we built the world's most comprehensive app for digital nomads. With our app, you can visit places with visual descriptions of the areas (POI – points of interest)

 When the user is near the area he/she can take up the camera and observe graphics with associated text related to the place.

 App has built in features such as menu to edit settings, language, theme etc.

Temporary views for: MAP, CAMERA, GRAPH, INFORMATION

Raw and filtered Sensor recording of accelerometer, gyroscope

Computed orientation using accelerometer and magnetometer

Visualization of the sensor data with orientation
This app was developed during a student project by a team (Team ID=6) of three members:

Magnus Roald Ree 
Tore Bjerkan Tore Bjerkan
Sharmila Ratnasingam

Here, the user gets the opportunity to track their own activity. By pressing start, the app starts tracking the movements. The app draws a line along the path where the user moves. In case the cursor of the user is not visible, is it possible to press \'here\' to center the map on the marker.
Click on map to add a point there
You must select a marker(poi) first!
You need to allow camerapermissions in Android Settings to use this feature
There is no image connected to this point!
You ran %.2f meters in %.2f seconds at an average speed of %.2f m/s
The Image connected to this point
Credit page showing name and product idea
